pr_title: [Drools 5867] - Update ApplyPmmlModelCommand to manage both PMML implementations

timeline.message: [DROOLS-5867] Implemented PMMLCommandExecutorImpl and PMMLCommandExecutorFactoryImpl. Updated kie.conf
[DROOLS-5867] Using static method inside PMMLAssemblerServices. Fixed kie.conf
[DROOLS-5867] Implemented/updated ApplyPmmlModelCommand and related test. Cleanup.

timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Please don't use Test suffix otherwise Maven will consider this class as a test class and try to load. What about Mock instead?
timeline.author: danielezonca
